content.data:
When selecting a Part in 3D View you gain the ability to change some 
 of that Objects Visual Properties. You can select more than one Object 
 at a time by using    + 
 Left Mouse Click .

Visual 
	 - Finish -  Changes the Finish on the selected Part(s). 
 Visual 
	 - Texture -  Changes the Texture on the selected Part(s). 
 Visual 
	 - Finish Type -  Changes the Finish Type on the selected Part(s).

Visual 
	 - Finish -  Changes the Finish on the selected Part(s).

Visual 
	 - Finish -  Changes the Finish on the selected Part(s).

Visual 
	 - Texture -  Changes the Texture on the selected Part(s).

Visual 
	 - Texture -  Changes the Texture on the selected Part(s).

Visual 
	 - Finish Type -  Changes the Finish Type on the selected Part(s).

Visual 
	 - Finish Type -  Changes the Finish Type on the selected Part(s).
